data.title: Friendly and Knowledgeable
data.text: Went in for the first time last night after exeperincing The Ocala First Friday downtown art walk. Our daughter-in-law had visited the establishment a few times and encouraged us to go. We inquired about a certain varietal, and the wine expert behind the counter pointed us toward a satisfying yet inexpensive bottle. We would go again.

data.title: If you like wine and you haven't tried this place your missing it!
data.text: Just off the downtown square there is a quaint wine shop downstairs and upstairs you can enjoy a glass of your favorite wine, some specialty food items, great cheese plates, and a desert with  local musicians entertaining.  If you can't find your special wine the owner can most likely order it and have it for you in short time.

data.title: Cozy atmosphere
data.text: The Ocala Wine Experience is a special place for that intimate evening.   Unique wine shop downstairs and cozy room upstairs to enjoy beverages and entertainment.

data.title: Cozy and romantic!
data.text: We stopped in on a rainy afternoon for lunch and a glass of wine and had no idea that we had just stumbled into a terrific little gem in the heart of Ocala. The service was friendly and attentive and the food and wine were just what we were looking for. A wonderful experience!!
